Plz get on this show{{champion:432}}Love all that music {{champion:37}}
I don't really enjoy these that much, but I suppose they're fun when I'm actually playing league.
What is it that isn't catching your attention about the show? We'd love to hear what we can improve on.

nah I like them because im playing LoL when out of nowhere they start singing I died because if it lol its just funny and the charisma to do it must be high like +12 I think the best part about podcasts like these is that they're not trying to win u over with many gimmicks what they are doing is very down to earth in the fact that they are interview players about general life things, tips, stories and its entertaining to say the very least and something this game needs to make people more aware of the fact that this game isn't just a game anymore its a life style now like one person said in a match XD props for the guyz who pioneered this  and the many others who realize that things like these in communities is what makes a great game, evolve into something greater, something that won't ever be forgotten. Almost like what CBGBs did for punk rock, and What Tv did from its beginnings
Darshan, i challenge to better yourself by not saying "like" as much in your interviews. Impress me, if you can...
This was wonderful and informative. Just wow. I adore this <3
The into music is just a hint that URF will become a permanent gamemode {{item:3070}} .
agree that music was pretty cool

I remember before our first episode I was picking options for Zwill to listen to. I'd prepared a few, but knew Welcome To Planet Urf was my first choice, and had prepared a big pitch to convince the gang.

Zwill walked in, I played him Urf, he said "That's the one." and walked out before I could even say anything. The guy knows what he likes.

#JustPodcastThings
any chance we saw other server rioter/player/streamer in those podcast or is it NA recorded? (aka in riot office^^)

Hey Flemman!

These are recorded in our LA studio. That being said, I'll be sure to pass along a desire to hear from Rioters around the globe. 

Thanks!
Great episode; I like that these installments aren't "League Exclusive"; they talk about a variety of topics. Also, Really liked the "New Champ Select" episode a lot.

We're hoping that we can hit diverse topics for 2016. There are SO many different Rioters to speak with, and each discussion has a habit of developing in ways we didn't anticipate, it's hard to pick from our potential guests...
